Package toxi.video.capture

Interface Summary
SimpleCapture This is a minimal definition of a video capture interface as currently used by the LibCV library.
 

Class Summary
JMFSimpleCapture JMFSimpleCapture is a implementation of the SimpleCapture interface using Sun's Java Media Framework.
LibCV LibCV is a basic video capture wrapper and computer vision library for Processing.
